H0.text: Curacao was a colony of which country. Spain

H1.text: Curacao was a colony of which country. France

H2.text: Curacao was a colony of which country. Britain

H3.text: Curacao was a colony of which country. Olanda

A4.text: In 1499, Curaçao became a Spanish colony after Alonso de Ojeda's expedition.

A5.text: The Dutch West India Company invaded the island in 1634; the Spanish surrendered in San Juan.

A6.text: After the bankruptcy of the WIC in 1791, Curaçao became an actual Dutch colony.
